features: ⚡4 ports fast car charger:2 for your choice-BK350 with 3 USB A ports and 1 QC 3.0 port is compatible with most Android mainstream phones for fast charging.BK351 with a PD 2.4A USB C port,designed for compatible with iphone,providing up to 66w power output and reaching 90% charge in <45 minutes.It can charge up to 4 devices at the same time,such as Android,iphone and laptop,achieving true stability and speed.

⚡Voltage detection：Car cigarette lighter adapter with LED digital display voltage meter, you can monitor and display the voltage of the car battery in real time,to master the health of the car's electrical system,let you take timely measures to avoid possible breakdowns during driving.Help you drive safely and discharge safety hazards.

⚡Upgrade smart chip:Our compact charger has a built-in upgraded smart master core chip that contains a power management chip and a fast charging protocol chip.It can provide protection against over voltage,over current,over temperature and over power short circuit.It can also intelligently identify electronic devices and adjust the current output to ensure your safe charging while driving.

⚡LED light and anti-fall:When the car charger is charging,which will have LED light display,You don't need to struggle to find the charging port in the dark any more and the soft light increases the warm atmosphere in the car.On both sides of the charger we have strengthened the anti-slip shrapnel, elastic and solid，even if driving on uneven mountain reads,there will be no power failure.

⚡Wide compatibility: Effectively compatible with various cell phones,tablets,car recorders and other USB devices for charging,widely used in mainstream models with 12-24V voltage input,compatible with various models of cigarette lighters,including family cars,business SUVs,off-road sports cars,etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This provides fast charging and slow charging.It tells you your car battery charge too. It tells you your battery charge too. You can see if your battery is charging correctly or not. It could save you from getting stranded somewhere. Cheap insurance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Many ports with good charge
reviews.reviewText: This car charger works really well. Even with multiple devices plugged into it, it has charged fairly fast. I needed more plugs than my previous car charger, and I was worried that this product would not be able to hold up with having more than one device plugged into it. However, as I stated before, it’s been great since I’ve been using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Given the cost and features, I was skeptical about this charger. I bought a two pack and have used them daily for a few weeks. They work great and I am very happy with my purchase. I love that they are fairly low profile, especially for having 4 ports. They look nice and fit well inside the compartment my outlets are in. The fast charging port works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool so far
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. I wanted to give it 5 stars because over all everything else was great. However, the only reason why I gave it 4 stars was the top part had scratches. Now if it works and does the job then I’m fine with a few scratches. However, not everyone thinks like me especially if you’re paying for it. But like I said I’m cool because it’s getting the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Voltage display seems serviceable enough for a gas car, but maybe not on a hybrid
reviews.reviewText: I live in a colder area and since COVID started I haven't been driving my car as much, so a concern I now have is my 12V battery fainting on me during winter. This charger seemed like a quick and easy way to check if a battery needs topping up, but I did notice a difference between a gas car and a hybrid: on a gas car, turning on the dashboard will have the display show a number between 11-12V, but once the engine is turned on it would raise to 14V and remain there for as long as the engine was running. On a hybrid however, given that the electrical engine is turned on the moment the car is powered up, the display would jump immediately to 14V. For this reason, I surmise it might not be possible to get an accurate display of the 12V battery health on a hybrid through this method. I thought it was an interesting observation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you informed
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent and should be standard in every vehicle. This tells you in a glance if your vehicle is going to start. It also tells you in a glance if your having a electrical problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Definitely worth the money! We had a snow storm a couple weeks back and lost power, Made our way to the car for an hour and charged two phones and the iPad all at the same time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I ordered this charger and within 2 weeks the screen stopped working.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this charger and within 2 weeks the screen stopped working. Please keep in mind that I drive the vehicle that it is placed in about 2-3 times a week. The charger is still charging even though the screen doesn't work.
